title: Monument to the Aviators
body: In the Municipal Garden, the foundation stone of the monument commemorating the aerial crossing from Lisbon to Funchal, carried out by the illustrious aviators Gago Coutinho and Sacadura Cabral, was laid on March 28, 1921. The solemn inauguration took place on May 11, 1921. See Jardim Municipal (II-182).

1921: Inauguration of the monument to the aviators Gago Coutinho and Sacadura Cabral
